name: ansible
description: Ansible is a widely-used IT automation and configuration management tool that coordinates server provisioning, application deployment, and orchestration using YAML-based playbooks. It is agentless and works over SSH.
features: IT Automation: Automate server provisioning, configuration, and application deployment. Reduce manual work dramatically.
YAML Playbooks: Define infrastructure as code using simple, readable YAML syntax. Easy to learn and maintain.
Agentless: Works over SSH without requiring agents on target systems. Minimal setup required.
Orchestration: Coordinate complex multi-tier deployments across hundreds of servers. Scale effortlessly.
Extensive Modules: Thousands of built-in modules for common tasks and integrations. Ready to use.
Idempotent: Run playbooks repeatedly with consistent, predictable results. Safe automation.
Community Support: Massive ecosystem with shared roles and playbooks. Never start from scratch.
